description.p: Embedded MATLAB® enables you to generate C code automatically from MATLAB® and include MATLAB algorithms in Simulink® models for efficient system simulation and code generation. A subset of the MATLAB language, Embedded MATLAB supports MATLAB to C translation for implementing embedded algorithms and systems.
Search for "Embedded MATLAB" to find related demos in other products.

demoitem.label: Generating MEX Functions from MATLAB Code (8 min, 24 sec)
